member.name: T:ATS.Database.LocalDB`1
member.summary: wraps and synchronizes DB as IModel.

member.name: M:ATS.Database.LocalDB`1.Enter(`0[])
member.remarks: Disallows adding records with empty fields.
member.returns: true if something was added (and not replaced).

member.name: M:ATS.Database.LocalDB`1.Simplify(`0[])
member.remarks: For string tuples, blank and empty fields are set to null.

member.name: M:ATS.Database.LocalDB`1.Matcher(`0[])
member.remarks: Just match prefix of longer tuples; never match shorter tuples.

member.name: P:ATS.Database.LocalDB`1.Count
member.summary: number of tuples, delegate to list.
